CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT as CHI picks up a toy off the floor
<bef> MOT gets on her knees next to CHI . MOT sits back next to CHI
MOT looks directly into CHI's face
CHI looks at the toy duck she is holding then looks up at MOT
MOT grabs at the toy duck
CHI is also still holding the duck
CHI touches the duck with her other hand
CHI looks down at the duck then looks up at MOT
CHI looks at the duck then up at MOT briefly
CHI stares at the toy duck
<$=1> MOT touches and squeezes the feet of the toy duck
CHI points to a certain part of the duck
CHI points to a different part of the duck
<aft> CHI puts the toy duck on the floor and looks at the toy truck
<bef> CHI begins to play with the toy truck
<bef> MOT moves a little closer to CHI
<bef> CHI picks up the car briefly . CHI reaches out and puts her hand on the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI takes her hands off the jack+in+the+box
a door is slammed outside somewhere
CHI pulls the jack+in+the+box close to her
MOT touches the handle of the jack+in+the+box then rests her hand on top
<bef> CHI tries to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts her hand on the jack+in+the+box
CHI puts one hand on top of the jack+in+the+box and the other one on the handle
<bef> CHI tries unsuccessfully to turn the handle
<aft> MOT begins to turn the handle
CHI points to the book on the floor . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
MOT stops turning the handle and pushes the jack+in+the+box across the room
CHI tries to sit on MOT's lap
MOT puts CHI on her lap then gets the book
CHI points to a chair in the room
<bef> CHI looked at the chair . CHI looks at the book
CHI stares briefly at the page
MOT points to the page . MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to the previous page
CHI looks at where MOT pointed
CHI points to the next page
<2> MOT points to the previous page
<aft> CHI starts to turn the page
CHI runs her finger up the page
CHI stops her finger and points to the page
CHI starts to turn the page
<aft> MOT tries to separate the pages of the book
CHI opens the book to the next page
CHI looks at the book and points to the opposite page
CHI looks at where MOT pointed
MOT points to where CHI pointed then looks at CHI
MOT pretends to feed herself with food from the book
MOT pretends to feed the jack+in+the+box on one page ice cream from the other page
CHI stares at the page and points to the page
CHI points to the opposite page
CHI points to the previous page
CHI places her hand on her dress
<3 .> MOT starts to turn the page
CHI looks at the page then points to the page
CHI points at the same spot on the page
CHI points to the previous page
MOT makes a circle on the page with her finger
CHI smiles and points to the page
<bef> CHI tries to turn the page . CHI points to the page
MOT reaches out and touches the toy truck on the floor
CHI looks at the truck on the floor
CHI starts to turn the page
MOT runs her finger along the page .
CHI looks towards the door then points to the door
CHI starts to turn the page
<bef> MOT pushes the page down with her finger
<bef> CHI looks down at the page . CHI points to the page
<bef> CHI puts both of her hands on the page
CHI looks at and points to the page
CHI stares blankly at the page
MOT points to the page bouncing her finger up and down
CHI stares blankly at the page
CHI looks at a chair in the room and points towards the chair
CHI glances at the room quickly
CHI puts her hand on the open cover of the book . CHI closes the book and drops it on the floor
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box on the floor
MOT places her hand on CHI's lap gently
CHI leans over and reaches for the ball while putting her hand on the jack+in+the+box for support
<aft> MOT looks at the corner briefly then at CHI
<bef> CHI is leaning over . CHI sits straight up on MOT's lap
MOT picks up the ball and throws it up in the air and then catches it
CHI waves her arms in the air . <aft> CHI looks over at the floor
MOT throws the ball straight up into the air again
MOT does not catch the ball as it falls down and bounces on the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI turns to watch the ball
CHI pulls at MOT's bag by the strap
MOT takes the bag from CHI and puts it behind her
CHI looks at the things on the floor
MOT picks CHI's sweater up off the floor and puts it behind her also
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI hits the top of the jack+in+the+box with her hand . CHI grabs a toy duck off the floor
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI fixes her attention on the jack+in+the+box
CHI still holds the toy duck in her hand
CHI pokes at the clown's eyes
MOT points to the clown's eyes
<aft> MOT bounces the clown up and down so that the eyes move
CHI leans back against MOT . CHI watches the clown
<aft> MOT bounces the clown up and down so that the eyes move
CHI tries to push the clown down into the box
CHI pushes the clown into the box again
<1-4> MOT points to the cover of the box
CHI pushes the clown in the box with one hand while she tries to close the cover of the box with the other hand
MOT looks back reassuringly at CHI
CHI pushes the clown in the box again while trying to close the cover of the box
CHI looks down at the box and then back at MOT
MOT reaches around CHI and pushes the clown in the box
CHI closes the cover of the box
<bef> CHI tries unsuccessfully to turn the handle then leans back on MOT's lap
CHI still looks at the door
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT glances briefly at the door then looks at CHI
MOT continues to turn the handle
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box then points at the door
CHI is still pointing at the door
<bef> CHI grabs at the cushion of a nearby chair
<aft> CHI looks at MOT then back at the cushion
<aft> MOT looks up at the door
CHI turns and looks at the door
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 09:47:02
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV also tells MOT to give CHI one of the toys on the floor . MOT holds the string of beads up in front of CHI
INV takes the object out of the drawer
MOT tries moves the beads towards CHI
INV puts the object on the table
<5-7> MOT puts the beads on CHI's head
INV sets the object in motion
CHI blinks her eyes rapidly in concordance with the motion of the object then stares at the object
CHI raises her hand to her head and pushes MOT away then reaches for the object
CHI smiles and turns to MOT
<$=2> MOT takes CHI's arm and starts to wrap the beads around her wrist
<aft> CHI tries to remove the beads
CHI looks up at INV briefly
MOT tries to put the object over CHI's head again
CHI takes the beads off of her neck
CHI looks down at the floor
<bef> MOT motions as if she is going to help CHI remove the beads . MOT looks at CHI
CHI smiles and stares at INV . CHI places one hand on the table
CHI touches the strap from the chair that is around her waist with her other hand
MOT leans forward so that she is looking directly at CHI's face
CHI continues to look at INV
INV tells MOT about the Parent Child Interaction Boxes . MOT puts CHI on her lap . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity
MOT puts CHI on the floor . <aft> MOT walks over to the desk where the PCI boxes are
CHI stands at the table and watches MOT
<$=1> MOT walks out of camera view
apparently MOT is holding the ball
CHI walks over to the desk
MOT throws the ball to CHI
<7> MOT walks over to the table
MOT pulls one of the chairs at the table away
MOT walks over to the desk
CHI tugs at the bottom desk drawer
CHI looks up at MOT then looks back at the desk
CHI is still pulling at the desk drawer . MOT is still out of camera view
MOT drops the ball on the floor
<1-2> MOT walks closer to the desk
MOT sits on the floor with the cloth over her head
CHI violently pulls the cloth off MOT's head and drops it on the floor
MOT picks up the cloth . MOT starts to hold the cloth up in front of her
CHI grabs cloth and pulls downward
CHI reaches up for something on the desk
MOT puts the cloth on the floor . <aft> MOT goes over to the desk on her knees
CHI is reaching for something on top of the desk
MOT and the top of the desk are out of camera view
CHI points to a different box on the desk
<3-5> MOT begins to open the box
CHI starts to pull the box off the desk
<$=1> MOT takes the crayons off of the desk
CHI continues to pull the box off the desk
<$=1> MOT helps CHI put the box on the floor
CHI leans way over the box
<aft> MOT puts the paper on the floor
CHI grabs a crayon and sits on the floor
<bef> MOT sits on the floor . MOT moves the box so it is between her and CHI
CHI reaches in the box as MOT moves it
<3-7> MOT moves her finger back and forth on the paper in the box
CHI reaches in the box and pulls at the paper
MOT starts to pick up the box
CHI holds the paper in the air
MOT turns the box over and places it on the floor
<$=1> MOT taps the top of the box with her hand
CHI puts the paper on the top of the box
CHI goes to put her crayon down on the box then puts it over the paper and then holds over the box again
<1-2> MOT pushes the paper towards CHI
CHI draws on the paper with the crayon
CHI continues drawing then stops drawing
CHI begins to draw with the other crayon
CHI draws briefly then reaches behind her
MOT moves the paper on the box
<1-2> MOT looks over near the desk . <aft> MOT looks under the box
CHI pulls her piece of paper off the box
<1-3> MOT grabs CHI's paper and puts it on the box . <aft> MOT puts a different crayon on the floor in front of CHI
MOT is looking at the floor near CHI
CHI stares blankly at the crayon
CHI picks up the crayon with her other hand and starts to draw with it
<1-4> MOT draws a circle with her finger on the paper
End of PCI Crayons and Paper
<aft> CHI stands up and faces the desk
<2-4> MOT motions to the desk with her hand
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT gets up on her knees
MOT points to the box on the desk
MOT moves the box over to the floor
CHI extends her arm up towards the box
MOT starts to open the box
CHI picks up the book and sits on the floor
MOT starts to pick up the crayons and paper
opens the book . CHI picks up some of the crayons and starts to draw in the book
MOT grabs the crayon away from CHI
MOT puts the crayon in the box
<1-5> MOT closes the cover on the box . <5-10 .> MOT places the box on the chair near the desk
<bef> MOT picks up the cloth and the ball . <$=2> MOT puts the ball and the cloth away in the boxes on the desk
<bef> CHI walks over to the table . CHI tries to climb into the chair at the table
MOT sits on the floor and holds the book out to CHI
<aft> MOT pats her lap and smiles
MOT starts to pull CHI onto her lap
CHI walks to a chair across the room
<aft> MOT gets up on her knees and opens the book
CHI looks up and points at the two way mirror on the wall . CHI looks at MOT
<1-2> MOT points to the chair . <3-6> MOT holds up the book
CHI turns around in the chair so that she is sitting
<bef> MOT pulls the chair over to where she is . MOT holds the book out on front of CHI and then sits down
CHI grabs the book and holds it on her lap
CHI points to the other page
CHI closes the book almost completely
MOT opens book up a little
CHI starts to turn the page
CHI looks at the page then looks at MOT
CHI tries to turn the page
MOT tries to help CHI turn the page
there are no more pages to turn . CHI is trying to turn the back cover of the book
MOT tilts the cover of the book back and forth in front of CHI
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
CHI pulls the book away from MOT and throws it on the floor
<bef> CHI looks down indecisively . CHI looks up and points to the desk
CHI points to the desk again
CHI gets out of the chair
MOT goes over to the desk
INV enters the room End of PCI - Book
